total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of numbers in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the rows that contain only 1s and 4s.
Q3: Identify the rows that contain a sequence of numbers.
Q4: Identify the rows that contain a sequence of numbers and zeros.
Q5: Identify the pattern of the sequence of numbers.
Q6: Identify the pattern of the sequence of numbers when zeros are included.
Q7: Identify the pattern of the sequence of numbers when zeros are replaced with the sequence of numbers.
Q8: Apply the identified pattern to the rows in the quiz input grid that contain zeros.
Q9: Replace the zeros in the quiz input grid with the sequence of numbers according to the identified pattern.

Q7: Determine the rule for replacing zeros with the sequence of numbers.
Q8: Apply the rule to the input grid to generate the output grid.
